import { Component } from 'react'; class FormationPage extends Component{ state ={ username : "", mail:"", password:"" } getData = async() =>{ const response = await fetch("/showformation"); const body = await response.json(); if (response.status !=200) throw Error(body.message); return body; } componentDidMount() { this.getData() .then(res=>{ const data = res; this.setState({formation: data}); }) } render(){ let foramtionArr= []; return (
